metadata.title: CVE-2021-38371 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The STARTTLS feature in Exim through 4.94.2 allows response injection(buffering) during MTA SMTP sending.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38371` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm4
exim4-base - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm4
exim4-config - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm4
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm4
exim4-daemon-light - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm4
eximon4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: exim4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm4').
